name: Aventuras con Rodrigo: Estados escondidos - El medio oeste de EE.UU.
name_original: Aventuras con Rodrigo: Estados escondidos - El medio oeste de EE.UU.
description:
Aventuras con Rodrigo: Estados escondidos - El medio oeste de EE.UU.

Help Rodrigo find the hidden mid-west U.S. states!
This is a simple game you can use to practice location words in Spanish.

In this game your goal is to find 5 states based on the information on the sign that Rodrigo is holding. You have 3 lives to do so. Good luck!

For something a little more difficult, play Aventuras con Rodrigo: Estados escondidos - México.

This game created by Jeremy A. Robinson at Gustavus Adolphus College.
